===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|にっすう|y=o|acc=3|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|にっすう}}

# [[days]] (of duration)
# [[numerals]] of the days

====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|秒数|びょうすう}}: the numerals of the seconds
* {{ja-r|分数|ふんすう}}: the numerals of the minutes
* {{ja-r|時間|じかん}}: the numerals of the hours, time
* {{ja-r|週数|しゅうすう}}: the numerals of the weeks
* {{ja-r|月数|つきすう}}: the numerals of the months
* {{ja-r|年数|ねんすう}}: the numerals of the years
